name: View C CR
description: MAXEMA® - A Top Italian Brand.  The View is a harmony of curved lines and slender elements in a pen that evokes the prestige and the value of uniqueness.The metal clip stands out for its imposing dimensions: it is suitable not only for classical laser engraving but also for Pad Printing. The majesty of the metal clip is offset by the gracefully svelte lines of the cap. Colourful barrel, with chiny chromed metal tip and clip, twist-action, made of non-toxic, highly resistant ABS plastic, galvanic process used to chrome tip. Jumbo refill available in black or blue ink, up to 2500 metres of writing.
additionalInfo: Italian Design and Make. Exclusive to Dex Collection in Australia and New Zealand.
productDisclaimer: GST additional. Other additional charges may apply. We reserve the right to change prices and charges without notice. Days stated means working days from artwork approval to dispatch.
